DOC.detailed_description: Hysteroscopy frequently use diagnose abnormal uterine bleeding , endometrial polyp submucous myoma . However , hysteroscopic procedure cause morbidity even mortality relate infusion distension medium . We use manual syringe infusion method infuse fluid distend uterine cavity institute without significant morbidity , seem method need less amount distension medium , possible result less possibility hyponatremia . Therefore , aim study perform randomize controlled trial compare manual syringe infusion method conventional infusion pump method clarify manual syringe infusion method really need less amount distension medium hysteroscopy .
